PDFelement has ended support for the current version, please update to the latest major version 9 to enjoy more advanced features with a better user experience!Support for jumping to cloud storage space
Support for extracting texts in the screenshot by optical characters recognition
Support for sharing files by QR code scanning
Support for adding page number
Support for setting the default file path for new files
Optimize the annotation property setting experience
Optimize page replacement experience
Corrections and improvements in many small details
Fix the crash issue that might happen in certain situations
